article.title: Cooperation Between Types of Libraries An annotated bibliography1969-1971 supplement
article.author: Gilluly, M.E.Wert, L.M.
article.text: This bibliography is designed to supplement capitalize Between Types of Libraries 1940-1956 An Annotated Bibliography by Ralph H. Stenstrom. The staff of the Library Research Center at the University of Illinois in cooperation with the Illinois State Library plans to issue an annual supplement which will appear in Illinois libraries each year. It is hoped the supplements issued in this manner can be cumulated periodically and issued in monograph form.
